pasugiya wasara 40 ka kalaya thula teksas pranthaya amarika eksath janapadaye prabala "rathu" hewath ripablikan bala kandawurak lesa salakana ladi. 1976 janadhipathiwaranayedi jimi katar jayagrahanaya kala pasu amarikanu janadhipathiwarana kisiwakadi dimokratik apekshakayaku ema pranthaya jayagaththe natha. 1976 di ripablikan pakshaya tharanga kale awasidayaka thaththwayan yatathe bawath katar da dakune pranthayaka ayaku bawath mehidi salakiya yuthu we.
mathiwarana dinata pera chandaya prakasha kirime awasthawa uda karamin mewara janadhipathiwaranaya wenuwen amarikawe prantha kihipayaka chanda madhyasthana wiwrutha karanu laba thibe.
